mapper.select: SELECT act_no, mem_no, act_name, act_inten, act_calorie, is_shared FROM act

SELECT sa.save_act_no, sa.act_time, sa.mem_no, sa.act_no, sa.act_temp_no, sa.act_date, sa.total_metabolism, a.act_name, a.act_inten, a.act_calorie, a.is_shared FROM save_act sa JOIN act a ON sa.act_no = a.act_no WHERE sa.mem_no = #{memNo} AND DATE(sa.act_date) = DATE(#{actDate})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO save_act (act_time, mem_no, act_no, act_temp_no, act_date, total_metabolism) VALUES (#{actTime}, #{memNo}, #{actNo}, #{actTempNo}, #{actDate}, #{totalMetabolism})
INSERT INTO act (mem_no, act_name, act_inten, act_calorie, is_shared) VALUES (#{memNo}, #{actName}, #{actInten}, #{actCalorie}, #{shared})
mapper.select: SELECT act_no, mem_no, act_name, act_inten, act_calorie, is_shared FROM act WHERE mem_no = #{memNo} ORDER BY act_no DESC
